meanings.definition: The quality or state of being wavy.
meanings.sent1: The waviness of her hair made it look like ocean waves.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the waviness of the sea in his painting.
meanings.sent3: The waviness of the ribbon made it dance in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The waviness of the road ahead seemed to lead to an unknown adventure.
meanings.sent5: The waviness of the fabric added a touch of elegance to the dress.

meanings.sent1: The waviness of the lines on the paper gave it a unique texture.
meanings.sent2: The waviness of the sand dunes created a mesmerizing landscape.
meanings.sent3: The waviness of the frosting on the cake looked like tiny waves.
meanings.sent4: The waviness of the clouds in the sky painted a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent5: The waviness of the curtains added a sense of movement to the room.
